name: Clin N Pleural
title: Clinical N
notes:
**Note 1:** Regional nodes are the intrathoracic, internal mammary, peridiaphragmatic, scalene, and supraclavicular nodes. 

**Note 2:**  Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS, in this field.  Distant nodes are coded in distant metastasis.
rows: Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed

Clinical evaluation but unknown results or regional lymph node involvement not stated
Clinical evaluation done but results not documented in patient record
Metastasis in ipsilateral bronchopulmonary and/or hilar lymph node(s)

Regional lymph nodes, ipsilateral, intrapulmonary:
    Hilar:
        Bronchopulmonary
        Proximal lobar
        Pulmonary root
    Intrapulmonary:
        Interlobar
        Lobar
        Segmental
        Subsegmental
    Peri/parabronchial

Regional lymph nodes, NOS

Lymph nodes, NOS

Stated as N1
Metastasis in subcarinal lymph node(s) and/or ipsilateral internal mammary or mediastinal lymph node(s)

Regional lymph nodes, ipsilateral, mediastinal:
    Aortic (above diaphragm), NOS:
        Aorto-pulmonary window
        Ascending aorta
        Peri/para-aortic
        Phrenic
        Subaortic
    Carinal:
        Tracheobronchial
        Tracheal bifurcation
    Internal mammary (parasternal)
    Mediastinal, NOS:
        Anterior
        Posterior (tracheoesophageal)
    Pericardial
    Peri/paraesophageal (below carina)
    Peri/paratracheal, NOS:
        Lower peritracheal (azygos)
        Upper paratracheal
    Pretracheal and retrotracheal, NOS:
        Precarinal
    Prevascular
    Pulmonary ligament
    Subcardial
    Subcarinal

Regional lymph nodes, ipsilateral, mediastinal:
    Peridiaphragmatic

Stated as N2
Metastasis in contralateral mediastinal, internal mammary, or hilar node(s) and/or ipsilateral or contralateral supraclavicular or scalene lymph node(s)

Clinical N is not defined for the specific site/histology
In situ case but no pTis is defined by TNM

No clinical evaluation of regional lymph nodes
Cancer first detected on surgical resection
Unknown if any clinical assessment performed
